title: Teacher-Parent Conference with Michelle Griffo
description:
Joe is joined by Michelle Griffo, also known as @ApplesAndABCs on instagram! She confesses her most awful parent tendencies as the mother of an elementary aged student before she and Joe discuss the value of having a social media presence for professional development and networking. THEN Michelle gives the audience an amazing but time-limited opportunity, so make sure you check this episode out ASAP!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
